Meet in Margaritaville
Business Meets Pleasure in Paradise
Every Margaritaville hotel and resort provides a fun, friendly, and convenient setting for all kinds of corporate events. Whether you're hosting a large conference or just a small business meeting, you'll find the facilities and amenities you need to make sure it goes off without a hitch. And the best part? Margaritaville provides plenty of ways to unwind at the end of each day or celebrate when the work is done. Check out our venues below and let us know more about what you had in mind.

Island H2O Water Park near Margaritaville Resort Orlando
Dive into Family Fun
Island H2O Water Park features over 20 experiences, including thrilling slides, a lazy river, a wave pool, and a children's area. High-tech features invite guests to customize their experiences and share them with friends. You'll also find private cabanas and an adults-only area for chilling.
The water park is open from March through October
Visit Island H2O Website
Park Hours
*Water park hours are subject to change and times may vary. Admission is weather permitting. Please refer to the Island H2O website for the most up-to-date schedule and operating conditions.
Complimentary Water Park Admission
When you stay at Margaritaville Resort Orlando now through October 26, 2025, you receive
COMPLIMENTARY ADMISSION
to Island H2O Water Park - ranked among the Best Outdoor Water Parks by USA TODAY for four consecutive years. You save
$65.99 per person
every day of your stay when you visit Island H2O Water Park, located right next to our resort!
Book Now
To help you soak up the fun with no worries, we've put together answers to the most frequently asked questions about access, tickets, and more. Check out the details below and get ready to kick back, relax, and make a splash!
Island H2O Guest Access FAQ's
If I booked last year for a stay in March, do I qualify for water park access?
Complimentary access to Island H2O is available for:
Hotel guests with reservations made on or after December 6, 2024
Cottage & Villas guests with reservations made on or after January 2, 2025
If your reservation was made before these dates, water park access is not included.
How can I confirm if the water park is included in my reservation?
For assistance, please contact:
Margaritaville Resort Orlando:
407-479-0950
Margaritaville Cottages Orlando:
321-888-3401
Does this apply to guests who booked through Airbnb?
In most cases, no. Guests must book through
Margaritaville Resort Orlando, Margaritaville Cottages Orlando, or V Stays
to receive water park access.
However, if you booked an Airbnb unit
managed by an approved management company
(Rentyl or V Stays), you will have access.
Is there a shuttle available to and from the water park?
Yes, shuttle service is available for hotel guests as well as guests staying in the cottages/villas.
How many tickets do I receive, and how do I pick them up?
Water park vouchers will be provided at check-in, with one voucher per day for each guest on the reservation, up to the maximum room occupancy. Simply present your voucher at the water park entrance to exchange it for tickets.
What if my reservation doesn’t include water park access? Am I able to get discounted tickets?
Guests without included water park access can visit the
concierge desk
in the hotel lobby to purchase discounted tickets to the water park.
How do I get my tickets?
At check-in, you’ll receive a voucher for each day of your visit. The voucher will include the guest's name and the maximum number of guests allowed. Simply present your voucher at the water park entrance to exchange it for tickets.
Will I need a voucher for each day of my visit?
Yes. At check-in, the front desk agent will ask how many days you plan to visit and provide you with the corresponding number of vouchers.
Can I use the ticket on the day of check-in?
Yes, you can use the ticket on the day of check-in.
Can I visit the park on the day I check-out?
Yes, you can! Just let the front desk agent know you need a voucher for that day, and they will provide one.
Can I attend Island H2O's nighttime events with this program?
No, these tickets are only valid for regular daytime operating hours.
What are the operating days and hours for Island H2O Water Park?
For the most up-to-date information on days and hours of operation, please visit the
Hours & Park Info
page for Island H2O.
I have questions about Island H2O Water Park. How can I get in touch with them?
For more information, please call
407-910-1401
or email
[email protected]
.
Start Planning Your Getaway
Important Guest Reminder
To help maintain a safe, respectful, and family-friendly environment, all guests are required to follow
The Promenade at Sunset Walk's Dress Code
when entering or exiting Island H2O Water Park.
Coverups, clothing, and shoes are required at all times, including when walking to or from your car.
This policy applies to everyone and helps ensure a welcoming experience for all visitors. We appreciate your cooperation and understanding.
Island H2O Dress Code FAQ's
Why Is There a Dress Code When Entering or Leaving the Park?
The water park is located within The Promenade at Sunset Walk, a public shopping, dining, and entertainment destination. To maintain a safe, respectful, and family-friendly atmosphere for all visitors, guests are required to wear coverups, clothing, and shoes when moving through these shared spaces.
Does this apply even if I’m just walking to or from my car?
Yes. The dress code applies to all guests at all times when outside the water park, including when walking to or from your vehicle.
What counts as a coverup?
A coverup can be a sundress, t-shirt and shorts, or any modest clothing worn over your swimwear. It should be something you'd feel comfortable wearing in a public shopping and dining area.
Where can I find The Promenade at Sunset Walk's Dress Code Policy and Code of Conduct?
The Dress Code Policy and Code of Conduct are available on The Promenade at Sunset Walk's official website. You can find detailed information about attire requirements, guest behavior expectations, and other guidelines to help ensure a safe and enjoyable experience for everyone. If you're planning a visit, we recommend reviewing these policies in advance.
View Full Guidelines
What is Island H2O Water Park's dress code?
We kindly ask all guests to wear safe, modest, and appropriate swimwear and clothing while enjoying the park. This helps ensure a comfortable and respectful experience for everyone.

View Full Guidelines
What is Island H2O Water Park's dress code?
We kindly ask all guests to wear safe, modest, and appropriate swimwear and clothing while enjoying the park. This helps ensure a comfortable and respectful experience for everyone.
Island H2O Dress Code FAQ's
Why Is There a Dress Code When Entering or Leaving the Park?
The water park is located within The Promenade at Sunset Walk, a public shopping, dining, and entertainment destination. To maintain a safe, respectful, and family-friendly atmosphere for all visitors, guests are required to wear coverups, clothing, and shoes when moving through these shared spaces.
Does this apply even if I’m just walking to or from my car?
Yes. The dress code applies to all guests at all times when outside the water park, including when walking to or from your vehicle.
What counts as a coverup?
A coverup can be a sundress, t-shirt and shorts, or any modest clothing worn over your swimwear. It should be something you'd feel comfortable wearing in a public shopping and dining area.
Where can I find The Promenade at Sunset Walk's Dress Code Policy and Code of Conduct?
The Dress Code Policy and Code of Conduct are available on The Promenade at Sunset Walk's official website. You can find detailed information about attire requirements, guest behavior expectations, and other guidelines to help ensure a safe and enjoyable experience for everyone. If you're planning a visit, we recommend reviewing these policies in advance.

Enjoy a Peaceful Retreat at St. Somewhere Spa
Check In & Chill Out
An island-inspired paradise calls your name right outside your hotel room. St. Somewhere Spa is here to help you feel like the best version of yourself. Give your skin a glistening glow with our HydraFacial and embrace the serenity of our Himalayan Salt Room as the best spa in Orlando transforms you into a whole new you.
Unwind and recharge from a day of fun at the finest Orlando spa resort. Luxury spa treatments treat you to a stress-free body, and spa packages turn multiple tranquil experiences into one. St. Somewhere Spa takes wellness into a tropical oasis just for you.
Our massage therapy leaves your muscles free of all tension. Hair and nail enhancements give you that new look you've been searching for. Facial treatments bring a warm and youthful sense to your being as you take in the tropical ambiance. The serenity of a luxury spa in Orlando awaits at St. Somewhere Spa for complete relaxation.

Spa Information
Age Requirements
Spa services and amenities are for adults ages 18 and up. Guests under the age of 18 may enjoy select services when accompanied by a parent or guardian. Please contact St. Somewhere Spa for additional information and reservations.
Cancellation Policy
Should you need to cancel your reservation, we require a 24 hour cancellation. Reservations not canceled with a 24 hour notice and no-show appointments will be charged 100% of the full service price.
Service Charge
For your convenience, a 20% service charge will be applied to your final bill. Gratuities for exemplary service is at your discretion.
Arrival Time
Please arrive at least 30 minutes prior to your scheduled treatment time. Should you arrive late, we will make every effort to accommodate you for your full service time, we may shorten the treatment time to not run into the service of another guest.
Use of Salt Lounge, Sauna, Steam
Our lounge space is for ages 18 and up. This is a co-ed space, so we ask you please bring a bathing suit to take advantage of these amenities. This space is for guests who have spa reservations only.

Spa Information
Age Requirements
Spa services and amenities are for adults ages 18 and up. Guests under the age of 18 may enjoy select services when accompanied by a parent or guardian. Please contact St. Somewhere Spa for additional information and reservations.
Cancellation Policy
Should you need to cancel your reservation, we require a 24 hour cancellation. Reservations not canceled with a 24 hour notice and no-show appointments will be charged 100% of the full service price.
Service Charge
For your convenience, a 20% service charge will be applied to your final bill. Gratuities for exemplary service is at your discretion.
Arrival Time
Please arrive at least 30 minutes prior to your scheduled treatment time. Should you arrive late, we will make every effort to accommodate you for your full service time, we may shorten the treatment time to not run into the service of another guest.
Use of Salt Lounge, Sauna, Steam
Our lounge space is for ages 18 and up. This is a co-ed space, so we ask you please bring a bathing suit to take advantage of these amenities. This space is for guests who have spa reservations only.

Build Team Bonds With A Unique Twist To Your Team-Building Activities
at Margaritaville Resort Orlando
At Margaritaville Resort Orlando, we take a uniquely fun and chill approach to our team-building activities and options. These are great ways to improve communication and productivity, facilitate teams to getting to know each other better, and help you achieve your group goals.
Our team-building activities can be used by any business, large or small, to promote better teamwork in the workplace. As most business leaders know, great teamwork is one of the factors that is key to a company’s success.
Unique in style and format, our activities can also be used for birthdays, family reunions, wedding rehearsal dinners and anniversaries.
No matter what activity you choose, you can count on a professionally run team-building event that weaves in effective coaching, friendly competition and plenty of fun.

Entertainment and Nightlife At Margaritaville Resort Orlando
No Shortage of Fun
Margaritaville is known for fun, and there's no shortage of entertainment for you to enjoy around the property. Catch live music at Euphoria Lounge or Salty Rim Bar & Grill. You'll also find a range of entertainment options at the next-door Sunset Walk, offering an eat-in movie theater, live-music venues, bars, lounges, an arcade, and more.

Euphoria Lounge
Euphoria Fish House comes alive with vibrant live music every Tuesday through Sunday night from 7 to 11 PM.
Enjoy talented duos and solo acts performing in the cozy, tropical-style lounge while savoring fresh Florida‑inspired dishes and expertly crafted cocktails. Whether you're in the mood for mellow acoustic vibes or more upbeat tunes, Euphoria's live schedule offers a little something for everyone in a relaxed, paradise-inspired setting.

Salty Rim Bar & Grill
Sit back and sip on a nice Margarita and enjoy different live acts and truly embrace your changes in latitudes! Salty Rim Bar & Grill delivers the ultimate poolside jam session every Wednesday through Sunday afternoon, featuring Orlando's most talented live solo acts.
Nestled at the Fins Left Pool, it's the perfect backdrop for sipping frosty margaritas, munching on burgers or shrimp tacos, and tapping your toes to laid‑back acoustic sets.

Promenade at Sunset Walk
From the open-air Promenade Plaza Stage to a variety of dining venues, Sunset Walk, located next to Margaritaville Resort Orlando, is your go-to destination for top-tier live music by some of Central Florida's most exciting local artists.
Enjoy a dynamic blend of cover and original tunes spanning rock 'n' roll, country, Latin, reggae, top 40 hits, and more. Check out our Sunset Live music schedule to see who's performing next.

Euphoria Fish House for Upscale and Romantic Dining in Orlando
Play Video
A Taste of the Tropics
Euphoria Fish House brings the best of Florida’s celebrated seafood scene to your plate with Margaritaville flair. With “Euphoria” taking its name from Jimmy Buffett’s beloved yacht, this upscale dining destination kindles a tropical sense of intimate luxury with an impressive show kitchen and an inviting lounge. Whether you're enjoying a gourmet dinner with family and friends or a romantic evening with someone special, our culinary masters will wow you with a delectable menu of flavorful favorites. Located on the upper level of the hotel, Euphoria Fish House is open to both resort guests and locals.

Sink Into Fins Up Beach Club At Margaritaville Resort Orlando
A Tropical Oasis
Warm waters, soft sands, palm trees, and birds singing — Fins Up Beach Club is an island oasis just steps from your guest room. Relax in our lagoon pools, kick back on a chaise lounge, or opt for a chic private cabana. Guests can enjoy our heated pools in year-round comfort. Poolside service is available for all the umbrella drinks and cheeseburgers in paradise you could ask for.
Pool Hours
License to Chill Pool
Daily: Dawn – Dusk
Fins Left & Fins Right Pools
Sun – Thurs: 9 AM – 9 PM
Fri – Sat: 9 AM – 10 PM
Laid Back Cabana Rentals
Relax, unwind, and enjoy the charms of your own private cabana in paradise with relaxing seating, food and beverage service and more.
Each retreat offers lounge chairs, beach chairs, a small refrigerator stocked with bottled water and a fan to keep you cool!
Learn More
Surrey Bike Rental
Guests can reserve a bike at Sundries located at Fins Up Beach Club.
Available to Rent
Starting 9 AM daily.
Single Bench
Fits 2 peddlers plus 1 rider and 2 toddlers.
30 Minutes ................... $25
1 Hour ............................ $35
Double Bench
Fits 4 peddlers plus 2 riders and 2 toddlers.
30 Minutes ................... $30
1 Hour ............................ $40
Bike Rental Safety Rules
- Waiver must be signed prior to use.
- Must be 18 years of age or older to rent a Surrey Bike.
- All drivers of Surrey Bikes must be 18 years or older.
- Cyclists must be approximately 58 inches tall. All guests not meeting the height requirement must sit in a non-pedaling position.
- All cyclists should keep their feet on the pedals at all times. All non-peddlers must keep their feet on the foot-bar that runs through the center of the Surrey Bike.
- Surrey Bikes must always stay within the confines of resort property and should never be left unattended.
- Pedestrians on foot have the right of way.
- No open-toed shoes are allowed on Surrey Bikes.

Theme Parks
Experience World-Famous Attractions
Margaritaville Resort Orlando is located just minutes away from some of the most famous theme parks in the world. Choose between
Walt Disney World®
Resort's four theme parks and two water parks, Universal Orlando Resort's three theme parks and water park, and SeaWorld® Orlando's three separate destinations. LEGOLAND® Florida Resort is also less than an hour away.
Transportation Service
Concierge & Ticket Services
An unforgettable Orlando Getaway begins with the guidance of our on-site concierge team, who will be happy to assist you with planning a memorable vacation. Our concierge team is skilled in booking theme park tickets, dining reservations, show tickets, tee times, transportation, and so much more.
Open daily from
8 AM to 5 PM
, contact our on-site concierge team today at
407-479-0968
, or email
[email protected]
.
Buy Attraction Tickets
Walt Disney World®
Resort
Perhaps the most famous entertainment complex around,
Walt Disney World®
Resort boasts four theme parks and two water parks. Get the classic Disney experience at
Magic Kingdom®
Park, tour the world and see depictions of the future at
EPCOT®
, take in movie magic at
Disney’s Hollywood Studios®
, and glimpse animals from around the world at
Disney’s Animal Kingdom®
Theme Park. If you prefer to cool off, try
Disney’s Blizzard Beach®
Water Park or
Disney’s Typhoon Lagoon®
Water Park.
© Disney
Universal Orlando Resort
Universal’s theme parks bring the magic of Hollywood to Orlando. Discover five immersive worlds at the all-new Universal Epic Universe, dive into your favorite TV shows and movies at Universal Studios Florida, experience thrilling rides at Islands of Adventure, or splash around at Volcano Bay.
© Universal
SeaWorld® Orlando
Animal lovers will flock to SeaWorld® Orlando’s three distinct attractions. See a wide range of marine life and ride thrilling coasters at SeaWorld, swim with dolphins and snorkel with stingrays at Discovery Cove®, or enjoy the waterslides of Aquatica® Orlando.
© SeaWorld
Island H2O Water Park
Island H2O Water Park is Orlando's most immersive and technologically advanced water park. Located right next to Margaritaville Resort Orlando, the park features over 20 experiences, including thrilling slides, a lazy river, a wave pool, and a children’s area.
Learn More

Meet the Catering & Events Team
Turning Tropic Dreams into Seamless Celebrations
At Margaritaville Resort Orlando, every unforgettable event begins with a dedicated team. Our Catering & Events professionals bring creativity, care, and island-inspired hospitality to each celebration. From planning timelines to custom menus, they handle every detail with ease, so you can focus on making memories. Get to know the friendly experts who turn special occasions into truly remarkable experiences.
Kirk Schenkel
Director of Catering & Events
Originally from Fort Wayne, Indiana, Kirk Schenkel brings over 47 years of experience in the hospitality industry to his role as Director of Catering and Events. His career began with the prestigious Marriott Management Training Program, laying the foundation for decades of leadership and innovation in food and beverage operations.
Kirk spent 25 years with Interstate Hotels, where he played an integral role on opening task forces for numerous new properties across the country. His career includes leadership roles at some of the nation's most renowned resorts, including the Boca Raton Hotel and Club, Sawgrass Marriott Golf Resort & Spa, and Lake Arrowhead Resort. At each stop, Kirk established a reputation for operational excellence, team leadership, and elevated guest experiences.
Since joining Margaritaville in 2023, Kirk has brought his extensive expertise in banquet operations, catering execution, and food and beverage management to the team. His passion for service and deep industry knowledge continue to enhance every event hosted at the resort.
E-mail |
[email protected]
Office Phone | 689-201-1811
Tamara Tessmer
Senior Sales Manager of Catering & Events
Tamara Tessmer, originally from West Milford, New Jersey, brings over 30 years of experience in the hospitality industry and has spent the last two decades immersed in the world of weddings and events. Her passion for creating unforgettable celebrations was sparked in 2004, and from the moment she helped plan her first wedding, she knew she had found her true calling.
For more than 15 years, Tamara worked with one of the top event planning companies in Boca Raton, where she coordinated everything from intimate gatherings to elaborate, large-scale productions. In 2019, she made the move to Orlando and joined the Margaritaville Resort Orlando team in 2023, where she continues to do what she loves most - helping couples bring their wedding visions to life.
Known for her thoughtful attention to detail and calm, creative approach, Tamara believes every couple deserves a wedding day that is as unique and meaningful as their love story. She's especially inspired by that quiet, powerful moment just before the ceremony begins - when everything comes together, and all that's left is the joy, the love, and the anticipation.
E-mail |
[email protected]
Office Phone | 407-982-2130
Alana Biggie
Catering Sales Manager
Originally from Buffalo, NY, Alana Biggie discovered her passion for event planning while organizing her sister's bridal and baby showers. What began as a heartfelt gesture quickly grew into a calling - one fueled by creativity, attention to detail, and the joy of bringing people together for life's most meaningful moments.
With years of experience in the industry, Alana has planned everything from elegant weddings and vibrant quinceañeras to large-scale festivals and high-impact corporate events. Her expertise lies in seamlessly managing the details while ensuring every event feels personal, intentional, and unforgettable.
At Margaritaville Resort Orlando, Alana combines her passion for celebrations with the laid-back luxury of paradise. She's dedicated to making each couple's journey as stress-free and magical as possible - because every love story deserves a celebration that's just as extraordinary.

Office Phone | 321-888-3507

Fins Up Fitness Center
At Margaritaville Resort Orlando
Stay committed to your fitness routine even while on vacation at our state-of-the-art fitness center. Located within the luxurious Margaritaville Resort Orlando, our facility is equipped with a wide range of cardiovascular and weight training machines. Whether you’re focusing on core muscles or aiming for a full-body workout, you’ll find everything you need, including free weights,  workout equipment, and the bicycles.
Enhance your endurance on our treadmills and elliptical machines, each featuring a personal flat-screen television for your entertainment.
Access to the fitness center is included in the daily resort charge for guests of Margaritaville Resort Orlando, ensuring you can maintain your health and wellness goals during your stay.
Located right next to St. Somewhere Spa, the fitness center is available 24 hours a day with your room key.

Promenade at Sunset Walk: Entertainment, Dining, & Shopping
Promenade at Sunset Walk is the perfect destination for a fantastic meal and a bit of evening entertainment. Eateries here offer everything from casual burgers, tacos, and pizza to fine dining, while entertainment options include live-music venues, an arcade, bars, lounges, and a movie theater serving a full menu of food and beverages.

Laid-Back Cabana Rentals
Relax, unwind, and enjoy the charms of your own private cabana in paradise with relaxing seating, food and beverage service, and more.
Each cabana is equipped with lounge chairs, beach chairs, a small refrigerator, and a fan to keep you cool. All cabanas accommodate up to six people. Most feature two lounge chairs and two beach chairs, while select cabanas offer upgraded, couch-style furniture.
You may also upgrade the standard cabana to one of our two packages for an enhanced experience:
Lost Shaker Package
4 bottles of water
Lush tropical float
$25 food and beverage voucher
Parrot Paradise Package
6 bottles of water
Lush tropical float
$35 food and beverage voucher
1 activity voucher
Reserve a Cabana

Fri – Sat: 9 AM – 10 PM

Event Venues
Gather in Paradise at Margaritaville Resort Orlando
Whether you're hosting a high-energy corporate convention, a laid-back networking mixer, or a milestone social celebration, Margaritaville Resort Orlando offers the perfect blend of island-inspired fun and professional polish. Our flexible event spaces, infused with tropical charm, provide the ideal setting for everything from boardroom meetings and breakout sessions to elegant galas and festive reunions.
With customizable venues, modern amenities, and a dedicated events team, your next gathering will be anything but ordinary. Explore our variety of spaces designed to accommodate groups of all sizes-and turn your next event into an unforgettable experience.
Venue Features
Tables & Chairs
House Linens & Napkins
Flexible Table Layout
Podium & Stage (Meetings)
Microphone Options (Meetings)
Set Up & Break Down
Audio Visual Rental Options
Compass Rose Ballroom
Host your next event in our 7,000 sq. ft. ballroom, perfect for galas, conferences, or awards dinners. A sleek design and spacious layout set the stage for impactful presentations and elegant, tropical-inspired celebrations.
Features:
Built-In speaker system and lighting, Signature Margaritaville chandeliers, Neutral accents to match any occasion or theme, Carpeted, High Ceilings
Theater Capacity:
600 guests
Classroom Capacity:
270 guests
Reception Capacity:
350 guests
Parrot Lawn
This serene outdoor setting is perfect for receptions, team-building, or social events. With sweeping views and sunset backdrops, this versatile lawn blends charm and professionalism for memorable open-air gatherings.
Features:
Ceremony & Reception set up, Pool and resort view, Options for tent or market lighting
Capacity:
500 guests
Seagrass Dining Room
With 2,425 sq. ft. of space and tropical flair, the Seagrass Room is ideal for holiday parties, birthdays, or team events. Host up to 140 guests in laid-back elegance for any kind of celebration.
Features:
Tropical ceiling fans & wood ceiling accents, Blue wave-patterned carpet & coastal accents, Speaker system, Large windows & glass double doors, Enclosed private space, Access to Seagrass Terrace & Seagrass Foyer
Capacity:
140 guests
On Vacation
Enjoy 3,200 sq. ft. of vibrant event space, designed for lively celebrations. With bold colors, tropical decor, and a built-in bar, it is perfect for birthdays, reunions, and dance parties, offering a relaxed atmosphere and plenty of room to celebrate.
Features:
Island accents and colors, Access to On Vacation Terrace with outdoor lounge & fire pit, Built-In bar, Built-In stage for a DJ, Band, or podium
Reception Capacity:
140 guests
Continental Drifter
Enjoy 777 sq. ft. of flexible meeting space, ideal for breakout sessions or retreats. With island-inspired décor and a cozy, professional setting, it’s perfect for productive team time.
Features:
Wood ceiling accents, Carpet & coastal accents, Speaker system, Enclosed private space
Theater Capacity:
50 guests
Classroom Capacity:
30 guests
Conference Capacity:
20 guests
Hemisphere Dancer
With 890 sq. ft. of flexible space and direct access to the Nautical Terrace, this location features abundant natural light and a touch of outdoor charm. It is well suited for meetings, receptions, or strategy sessions.
Features:
Wood ceiling accents, Carpet & coastal accents, Speaker system, Enclosed private space, Patio access to Nautical Terrace
Theater Capacity:
50 guests
Classroom Capacity:
30 guests
Conference Capacity:
20 guests
Nautical Wheeler
Blending 1,573 sq. ft. of coastal charm with seamless indoor-outdoor flow, this space is ideal for intimate receptions or ceremonies. Breezy design and patio doors create a relaxed, beach-inspired setting.
Features:
Access from Nautical Terrace and Compass Foyer, Patio Doors, Built in Sound System, Lighting, Coastal wood accents
Reception Capacity:
70 guests
Nautical Wheeler Terrace
This spacious outdoor terrace is perfect for corporate mixers, team celebrations, or social soirées. With breezy coastal charm and views of the Beach Club and Parrot Lawn, it offers a relaxed, tropical backdrop for any event.
Features:
Option for tent rentals or market lighting, Resort and pool views
Reception Capacity:
200 guests
Ceremony Capacity:
250 guests
Boardroom
The 727 sq. ft. Boardroom is designed with comfort and professionalism in mind. Its intimate layout provides the perfect setting for executive sessions or collaborative planning.
Features:
Large TV and AV Connection, Polycom Phone
Capacity
18 guests
License to Chill Pool
Perfect for poolside receptions, parties, or ceremonies, this 3,000 sq. ft. space is a tropical oasis. Surrounded by palms and filled with island energy, it adds a splash of fun to any celebration.
Features:
Pool chairs and loungers available, Options for market lighting, Pool fun for your guests, Built in bar, Private Restrooms
Reception Capacity:
200 guests
Ceremony Capacity:
100 guests
